### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before using it
### Errors when using entities without being plugged into electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into an electric network before using them
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
- Entity positions and statuses 
- Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace, burner-inserter, offshore-pump, boiler, steam-engine, pipe-group, belt-group, transport-belt)
